name: Pineapple Server
description: This is a simple Parse server than can be used with your app created on Pineapple.

SERVER_URL.description: The number of processes to run.

APP_ID.description: A secret key for verifying the integrity of signed cookies.

MASTER_KEY.description: The number of processes to run.

MASTER_USERNAME.description: DON'T SHARE. Master username to login to the server.

MASTER_PASSWORD.description: DON'T SHARE. Master password to login to the server.
